desc: *Open two windows side by side in Full Screen SplitView.*  Select by name and/or using a searchable popup display.  Also provides focus toggling between splitview "halves" and ability to close a fullscreen or split desktop by keyboard.
name: SplitView

desc: (Float) Time interval in seconds to check for MC/SplitView animations to complete
name: checkInterval

desc: (Boolean) Whether to print debug information to the console.  Can
name: debug

desc: (Float) How long in seconds to delay finding and clicking the other window
name: delayOtherClick

desc: (Float) How long in seconds to "hold" the zoom button down.
name: delayZoomHold

desc: (Boolean) Whether to show a thumbnail image of the window in the choice selection list.  On by default (which slightly slows the interface).
name: showImage

desc: Select an application and window _by name_ to enter split-view along side the currently focused window
name: byName

desc: Choose another window to enter split-view with current window
name: choose

desc: Use Mission Control to remove the current full-screen or split-view desktop (aka space) and switch back to the first user space.
name: removeCurrentFullScreenDesktop

desc: Switch focus from one side of a Split View to another, with an animated arrow showing the switch.
name: switchFocus
